item.description:
Lets head out to a great Pub in Newburyport and Dance to "Don't Call Me Shirley" http://www.dontcallmeshirley.info  if there is any interest to grab a bite before the band starts put it in comment section and maybe work it out amongst each other to reserve a table, not sure if reservations are required.

I will meet you downstairs for dancing and there is a cover charge believe its 7.00 but so well worth it, the atmosphere will be great for an event here,  there will be smoke blowers on the stage. Huge room for dancing!!

Just bring lots of smiles ;-)

Suggest you come early to park, there are side streets and several parking lots, maybe carpool.

P.S This band is so fantastic you will not be sitting one minute.

 

Time: 9pm-12am

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)

item.name: Lets Head Out and Show Support for Boston
